title.rendered: Concerts During NFR 2018: Things to do during the NFR week in Las Vegas

content.rendered:
Rodeo Vegas at The Mirage is back. Experience free NFR live streaming, free live entertainment, drink specials and giveaways nightly. Whether you’re a cowboy for life or just for the weekend, The Mirage is where you want to Rodeo Vegas.

Concerts During NFR 2018

If you’ve never been to the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo (NFR) in Las Vegas, this is an event you must attend, at least once in a lifetime. 2018 marks the 34th year for the Wrangler NFR to be held in Las Vegas. Don’t miss all the action before and after the NFR each night at the Cowboy Corral located at the Cox Pavilion, next to the Thomas & Mack Center. Get to the arena an hour early and head over to the Cowboy Corral. Keep up your heels and enjoy live entertainment.

2018 Rodeo Vegas at The Mirage

The Mirage Presents Rodeo Vegas 2018. The official Wrangler NFR After-Party of the PRCA. Offering the best FREE live entertainment from country music’s biggest stars. Besides joining over 70,000 rodeo fans in the ultimate rodeo party, here are a few other things to expect.

Dates: December 6 – 15
Time: 9:30 p.m. – 4 a.m.
Location: The Mirage Race & Sports Book

Parlor Lounge

Parlor Lounge will provide live music to rodeo fans looking for a more intimate setting. Admission is FREE with live music beginning at 9:30 p.m. nightly. The artists scheduled to perform are:

  • Brit Stokes – December 6, 7, & 8
  • Andy Griggs – December 13
  • Glen Templeton – December 14 & 15

Nightly NFR action on High Definition Projection TV screens. Enjoy drink specials & nightly prize giveaways throughout the performance. Remember you can catch the FREE nightly shuttle service to and from the Thomas and Mack Center.

Free Admission/ Open to the Public Guests 21 and over only.

2018 Gold Buckle Zone at MGM Grand

Enjoy FREE Live music, dancing, free viewing parties and giveaways nightly at the MGM Grand Gold Buckle Zone.

2018 Gold Buckle Zone Nightly Entertainment

  • Double Wide – Performing nightly on the Roper Main Stage
  • Dee Jay Silver – Presented by Roper – Performing nightly on the Roper Main Stage
  • Autograph signing with Champions

December 6 – 15
Time: 8 p.m. – 2 a.m.
Location: The Central at MGM Grand, near the Sports Book

Free Admission/ Open to the Public

Gary Leffew’s Bucking Ball at Tropicana Las Vegas

Gary Leffew’s Legendary Buck’N Ball at Tropicana Las Vegas December 6 – 15, 2018. The Legendary Buck’N Ball features Live country music, two-step dancing and drink specials. Doors Open at 6:30 nightly. Live viewing party followed by Gary Leffew’s Bucking Ball, Location: Tropicana Las Vegas Conference Center, Must be 21 and older.

Free Admission/ Open to the Public

Buckin’ Bash at The Orleans

Buckin’ Bash is home to Las Vegas’ greatest cowboy party, featuring live country music, brews, and two-steppin’. Doors Open at 9:00pm — 2:00 a.m. nightly, Location: Inside the Bourbon Street Lounge at the The Orleans Hotel & Casino.
Event lineup:

  • Rebel Soul – Dec. 6 – 8
  • Thrillbilly Deluxe – Dec. 9 – 10
  • Sam Riddle – Dec. 11 – 12
  • Cash Presley – Dec. 13 – 15
Free Admission/ Open to the Public Guests 21 and over only.

Other Events

Gilley’s Saloon at Treasure Island
December 6 – 15
8 p.m. – 2 a.m.
Gilley’s Saloon, Dance Hall & Bar-B-Que
Live entertainment and drink specials nightly!

Free Admission Before 9 p.m. / Open to the Public

Silverton Casino Presents Cowboys & Indians After Parties hosted by Justin Frazell
December 6 – 15
6 p.m. – Midnight
Veil Pavilion inside Silverton Casino Hotel
Live FREE all ages viewing parties followed by live bands each night (after party is 21+)

Free Admission/Open to the public
